snippet.title: CosmoPirates Trailer
snippet.description:
After 1.5 years of development by two devs, our CosmoPirates sci-fi deckbuilder is ready to go live on the 20th of June!

Get it on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2466240/CosmoPirates/

CosmoPirates is a humorous sci-fi deck-building roguelike, where you explore procedurally generated maps filled with bounty, danger, and quirky characters. 

Players must strategically select battles, collect cards, and manage their deck, ship, crew, and item collection. The ultimate goal is to defeat the Pirate Overlord and ascend to power. 

You start the game as a hero, but you end as a villain, facing your previous character as the Pirate Overlord in subsequent playthroughs.

Does it offer amazing 3D graphics and voiceovers? 

No, not really.

Is it thoroughly tested and there are no bugs or any other issues then? 

Also no.

Is it a super fun and engaging deckbuilder? 

We sure as hell hope so!

If you like deckbuilders, don't mind some rough edges, and would like to experience a game made out of passion and have a laugh or two - CosmoPirates is the game for you!

Please, please send us all your feedback - here, on Steam, or on our Discord channel.

For all the content creators out there - ping me if you would be interested in a review copy. We also have a press pack ready for you - http://cosmopirates.blackmoondev.com/press/
